fields.description: This property only exist in HiveConf and is always set to false. Lets get rid of dead code.

comments.body: +1 . Thought I have often wondered aboutthis. What is the code design for ? Debugging?

Could it be useful in hive server 2 type scenarios?
hive.exec.submitviachild 	Determines whether the map/reduce jobs should be submitted through a separate jvm in the non local mode. 	false - By default jobs are submitted through the same jvm as the compiler
WE have an open issue where we are trying to avoid hive-server crashes caused by "bad udfs in local mode" maybe this remains an answer.
